mapper.sql: m.menu_id,m.parent_id,m.menu_name, m.`path`,ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms,m.component, m.`menu_type`,m.icon,m.`order_num`, m.create_time,m.update_time,m.status, m.del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE r.del_flag = 1 AND r.`status` = 1 AND m.`status` = 1 AND ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rm.role_id = r.role_id AND r.status = 1 AND r.del_flag = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id AND u.status = 1 AND u.del_flag = 1 WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type in (0, 1) AND m.status = 1 AND m.del_flag = 1 ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num
